verses.verse: Then <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and <S%H2583>encamped<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead:<s%> <S%H1568><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5176>Nahash,<s%> <S%H3772>Make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us, and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> you.

And <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonite<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> them, On <S%H2063>this<s%> condition will I <S%H3772>make<s%> a covenant with you, that I may <S%H5365>thrust<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> it for a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Give us <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days'<s%> <S%H7503>respite,<s%> that we may <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and then, <S%H518>if<s%> there be <S%H369>no<s%> man to <S%H3467>save<s%> us, we will <S%H3318>come<s%> out to you.

Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H1696>told<s%> the <S%H1697>tidings<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of the <S%H5971>people:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up their <S%H6963>voices,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H1241>herd<s%> out of the <S%H7704>field;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> ails the <S%H5971>people<s%> that they <S%H1058>weep?<s%> And they <S%H5608>told<s%> him the <S%H1697>tidings<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh.<s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> on <S%H7586>Saul<s%> when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H1697>tidings,<s%> and his <S%H639>anger<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H6776>yoke<s%> of <S%H1241>oxen,<s%> and <S%H5408>hewed<s%> them in pieces, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> them throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>coasts<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H834>Whoever<s%> <S%H3318>comes<s%> not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> shall it be <S%H6213>done<s%> to his <S%H1241>oxen.<s%> And the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and they <S%H3318>came<s%> out with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>consent.<s%>

And when he <S%H6485>numbered<s%> them in <S%H966>Bezek,<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that <S%H935>came,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabeshgilead,<s%> <S%H1568><s%> To <S%H4279>morrow,<s%> by that time the <S%H8121>sun<s%> be <S%H2527>hot,<s%> you shall have <S%H8668>help.<s%> And the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>showed<s%> it to the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh;<s%> and they were <S%H8056>glad.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3003>Jabesh<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> we will <S%H3318>come<s%> out to you, and you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> with us <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H5869>seems<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to you.

And it was so on the <S%H4283>morrow,<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H7760>put<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7218>companies;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4264>host<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H821>watch,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> the <S%H5984>Ammonites<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H2527>heat<s%> of the <S%H3117>day:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that they which <S%H7604>remained<s%> were <S%H6327>scattered,<s%> so that <S%H8147>two<s%> of them were not <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is he that <S%H559>said,<s%> Shall <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>reign<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us? <S%H5414>bring<s%> the <S%H582>men,<s%> that we may put them to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> There shall not a <S%H376>man<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day:<s%> for to <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3212>Come,<s%> and let us <S%H3212>go<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H2318>renew<s%> the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they made <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> they <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> offerings <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> <S%H3966>greatly.<s%>
